availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James William Pates (Woodford County, Kentucky, wagon maker)

body.p: Woodford County, Kentucky, wagon maker. Kentucky native. Son of John O. Pates and Margaret Durham Pates. Married to Sarah Elizabeth Woolums Pates on November 15, 1859. Father of Ann Pates, Jane Pates, John Pates, and Mary Pates. Wagon maker in Midway in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Woodford County, Midway, p. 19.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky.
Birth and Death Records: Covington, Lexington, Louisville, and Newport â€“ Microfilm (before 1911), KDLA, Roll #7016167, Woodford County Deaths, file #22399.
